tool_description: Unofficial Wrapper API for the Fantasy Premier League
title: Fantasy Premier League

api_list.name: Search for League
api_list.description: Find a League by league name. Returns Max 10 results per page

optional_parameters.name: p
optional_parameters.description: Results Page Number.

api_list.name: Search for Manager
api_list.description: Find a Manager by real name. Returns Max 10 results per page

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The Name of the Manager You are searching for.

optional_parameters.name: p
optional_parameters.description: Page Number for results. Note, adding a page number larger than available number of pages will return a 400 error. Page count returned in response

api_list.name: H2H League
api_list.description: Return data on a Head-to-Head (H2H) league by provided league id

optional_parameters.name: sp
optional_parameters.description: Standings Page. Data has a \\\\\\\"has_next\\\\\\\" boolean to verify if next page exists

optional_parameters.name: ep
optional_parameters.description: Entries Page. Data has a \\\\\\\"has_next\\\\\\\" boolean to verify if next page exists

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com/fpl/leagues/h2h/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Classic Leagues
api_list.description: Return data on a classic league by provided league id

optional_parameters.name: ep
optional_parameters.description: Entries Page. Data has a \"has_next\" boolean to verify if next page exists

optional_parameters.name: sp
optional_parameters.description: Standings Page. Data has a \"has_next\" boolean to verify if next page exists

api_list.name: Fixtures
api_list.description: Return list of fixtures in the FPL season

optional_parameters.name: a
optional_parameters.description: Away Team ID

optional_parameters.name: as
optional_parameters.description: Away Team Score

optional_parameters.name: h
optional_parameters.description: Home Team ID

optional_parameters.name: gw
optional_parameters.description: Gameweek Filter

optional_parameters.name: hs
optional_parameters.description: Home Team Score

api_list.name: Teams Set-Piece Notes
api_list.description: Returns a list of team notes for updates around set-piece takers

optional_parameters.name: team
optional_parameters.description: Filter results by the provided team id

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com/team/notes/set-pieces"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

notes.info_message: Dean Smith confirmed after the Gameweek 12 win over Wolves in 2020/21 that Anwar El-Ghazi was the first choice for penalties.
Danny Ings scored from the spot in Gameweek 1 with El Ghazi off the pitch.
Graham Potter said after the Gameweek 11 match against Southampton in 2020/21 that Pascal Gro had "earned the responsibility" to continue taking Brighton's penalties.
Neal Maupay took Brighton's penalty ahead of Danny Welbeck when Pascal Gro was absent in Gameweek 5 of 2021/22.
Alexis Mac Allister scored a penalty in Gameweek 9 of 2021/22 with Neal Maupay, Pascal Gross and Danny Welbeck off the field.
Leandro Trossard scored a penalty in Gameweek 11 of 2021/22 with Neal Maupay, Pascal Gross, Danny Welbeck and Alexis Mac Allister off the field.
Chris Wood has revealed that he and Ashley Barnes take penalties that they themselves win.
Jay Rodriguez scored from the spot in Burnley's FA Cup win over Fulham in January, with Chris Wood and Ashley Barnes not on the pitch.

Thomas Tuchel confirmed after the win over Spurs in February that Jorginho and Mason Mount were his two penalty takers. Jorginho has taken all but one of Chelsea's spot-kicks in the league in 2020/21.
Timo Werner had taken a penalty in a cup competition earlier in the 2020/21 season.
Rafael Benitez confirmed after Gameweek 3 that Dominic Calvert-Lewin and Richarlison were first and second respectively for penalties.
Gylfi Sigurdsson was Everton's first-choice taker in 2020/21.
Andros Townsend took a penalty in Gameweek 6 with Calvert-Lewin, Richarlison and Sigurdsson absent.
Demarai Gray took a penalty in pre-season, with Richarlison, Calvert-Lewin, Sigurdsson and Townsend all not on the pitch.
Mateusz Klich began the 2020/21 season as Leeds' first-choice penalty-taker but Patrick Bamford stepped up in Gameweek 15, following an initial missed attempt by Klich in Gameweek 12.
Neither Klich nor Bamford were on the pitch when Rodrigo scored from the spot in Gameweek 9 of 2021/22.
Bamford wasn't on the pitch when Raphinha scored any of his penalties in 2021/22.
Youri Tielemans deputised for Jamie Vardy when the striker wasn't on the pitch in 2020/21.
Kelechi Iheanacho scored from the spot in pre-season and in the Community Shield but both Tielemans and Vardy were off the field.

Kevin De Bruyne has taken all of Manchester City's Premier League penalties when he has been fit and available but Riyad Mahrez stepped up to take one in the Champions League tie against Borussia Dortmund in April, a match that also featured De Bruyne.

Raheem Sterling and Ilkay Gundogan took penalties in Kevin De Bruyne and Sergio Aguero's absences but both missed. Rodri scored a spot-kick in Gameweek 24 but his manager later said that the midfielder wasn't his first-choice taker.
Christos Tzolis missed from the spot in the EFL Cup third round but Daniel Farke confirmed after full-time that Adam Idah had been the designated taker in Teemu Pukki's absence.
Dele Alli took a penalty in the absence of first-choice taker Harry Kane in Gameweek 2, despite former deputy Son Heung-min also being on the field.
Regular penalty taker Mark Noble wasn't on the pitch in Gameweek 1 when Michail Antonio stepped up to take - and missed - a spot-kick.
Manuel Lanzini scored a penalty in Gameweek 15 with Declan Rice and Michail Antonio on the field but Mark Noble off it.

api_list.name: Dream Team
api_list.description: Return the FPL dream-team for a chosen gameweek
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com/team/dream-team/{gameweek}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.description: Return data for a chosen team

api_list.name: FPL Player Historic Stats
api_list.description: Returns FPL player performance stats for previous FPL seasons

optional_parameters.name: s
optional_parameters.description: Filter data and return stats only for the provided season, i.e \"2019/20\", \"2014/15\" etc.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com/fpl/history/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: FPL Player gameweek stats

optional_parameters.name: gw
optional_parameters.description: Filter data to return stats for only the provided gameweek

api_list.name: FPL Player chips used
api_list.description: Returns the chips used by the provided FPL player, i.e wildcard, triple captain, free hit

optional_parameters.description: Filter results by gameweek to find which chips an FPL player used in the provided gameweek

api_list.name: Player History
api_list.description: Return FPL statistics for a provided player from previous seasons

optional_parameters.name: ast
optional_parameters.description: Filter data and return historic season data where the player assisted the provided amount of goals

optional_parameters.name: gls
optional_parameters.description: Filter data and return historic season data where the player scored the provided amount of goals

optional_parameters.name: cs
optional_parameters.description: Filter data and return historic season data where the player kept the provided amount of cleansheets

api_list.name: Player Results
api_list.description: Get all match results in the season so far for a player by a provided player id

optional_parameters.name: opp
optional_parameters.description: Opponent team id to filter results

optional_parameters.name: hs
optional_parameters.description: Home Score filter to return data where the home team scored the provided amount of goals

optional_parameters.name: as
optional_parameters.description: Away Score filter to return data where the away team scored the provided amount of goals

optional_parameters.name: cs
optional_parameters.description: Filter the data to return the results where the player kept a cleansheet (1 for a cleansheet, 0 for no cleansheet)

optional_parameters.name: gls
optional_parameters.description: Filter data to return results where the player scored the provided amount of goals

optional_parameters.name: ast
optional_parameters.description: Filter data to return results where the player assisted the provided amount of goals

optional_parameters.name: gw
optional_parameters.description: Filter the data to return results that took place on the provided gameweek

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com/player/{id}/results"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fantasy-premier-league3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Player Fixtures
api_list.description: Get all remaining fixtures for a player by a provided player id

optional_parameters.name: ht
optional_parameters.description: Home Team ID filter to return fixtures with the provided home team

optional_parameters.name: gw
optional_parameters.description: gameweek filter to return fixture for the given gameweek

optional_parameters.name: at
optional_parameters.description: Away Team ID filter to return fixtures with the provided away team

api_list.code:

}

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Players Simple
api_list.description: Return list of all players included in FPL in a simplified form, only including the player's first name, last name, web name, fpl cost, team id and their fpl photo address

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter by player name

api_list.name: Players
api_list.description: Return list of all players included in FPL

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Search query to filter by player name

api_list.name: Gameweeks by Month
api_list.description: Returns list of month objects and the corresponding first and final gameweeks that occur in each month

optional_parameters.name: gw
optional_parameters.description: Filter by Gameweek

api_list.name: Player Positions
api_list.description: Return data on each player position
